author: Daniel Green
method: Mix all the ingredients together, either in a food processor or in a large pestle and mortar, until they form a very smooth paste. The paste needs to be smooth so it does not interfere with the textures and flavours of other ingredients.
ingredients: 12 small green chillies,  4 cloves garlic,  4 shallots,  3 stalks lemongrass, tough outer layers removed,  thumb-sized piece of ginger, peeled,  4 fresh kaffir lime leaves (optional),  1 tsp shrimp paste,  salt,  freshly ground black pepper
